text: hello everyone! I am facing some issues while changing the color in HubSpot dnd when I have taken color field in a nested group. Is there any solution for this.
<@U7SL518D6> or <@UFBDBKQ1H> - seems like AJ might be out of office this week, Might there be someone else who can help us make progress on this one? :smile:

Could you DM me a link to the theme.json file in your design manager? Basically open the file in the design manager and copy and paste the link in the address bar.

That will help me to reproduce what you're experiencing.

Hey Oswaldo, I can confirm in the page creation area it looks like your theme label is working fine. I understand the issue you’re facing is about when you upload to the marketplace. I can see the version that you uploaded on the 14th that had lowercase + dashes in it.


*Have you tried uploading it as a new listing?*
(I’m just guessing that the label was changed after the listing was created,.There’s a chance maybe we’re not detecting that change.)

<@U7SL518D6> We’ve already built some pages using the existing file set that we’d prefer to maintain rather than upload and use a new theme. Is there any way to sort of ‘force refresh’ HubSpot reading the label change? I don’t think we ran into this issue when we submitted our previous theme, which is strange
